name: Into the Void
description: Jonas: 'I found this weird purple dimension. Physics might be... different.'

intro.text: Jonas: 'I found this weird purple dimension. Physics might be... different.'
intro.speaker: Jonas

intro.text: Zoey: 'It looks... glitchy. And very purple. I better stay on the path.'
intro.speaker: Zoey

outro.text: Zoey: 'Okay, the physics were normal. But the vibes? Definitely off.'
outro.speaker: Zoey

outro.text: Jonas: 'Just wait. The glitches are getting worse.'
outro.speaker: Jonas
